name: Deploy
description: The ability is triggered when the card is played.

name: Activate
description: Trigger the active ability of the card. A card cannot be activated the same turn it was played unless it gains haste.

name: Reactivate
description: Retrigger the activation ability. The card must not be inactive.

name: Deactivate
description: Move a card into the inactive position. This disables most abilities (i.e. card text).

name: Haste
description: The card can be activated on the turn it is played.

name: Equip
description: The ability is triggered when the equipment is assigned to a unit. Reserved for equipment cards.

name: Equipped
description: The ability is triggered (on equipment) as long as the equipment is assigned to a unit, or (on a unit) when the unit has a (sometimes specific) equipment.

name: Passive
description: The ability is triggered passively, as long as the card is on the battlefield and has not been deactivated.

name: Turnwise
description: The ability is triggered once per turn, at turn start.

name: Play
description: Move a card from hand to the battlefield, triggering its deploy ability.

name: Summon
description: Move a card to the battlefield, bypassing its deploy ability. A card can be summoned from hand, deck, or graveyard.

name: Resurrect
description: Play a card from graveyard (instead of from hand), triggering its deploy ability.

name: Tutor
description: Play a card from deck (instead of from hand), triggering its deploy ability. You must shuffle your deck at the start of the round if you tutored any cards in the previous round.

name: Destroy
description: Move a card from battlefield to graveyard, triggering its expire ability.

name: Discard
description: Move a card from hand or deck to graveyard.

name: Draw
description: Move a card from the top of deck to hand.

name: Banish
description: Remove a card from the game, bypassing any reflex or expire abilities.

name: Protect
description: When the condition is met, the unit provides protection to an eligible unit, preventing it from being targeted. Deactivation does not break protection.

name: Protector
description: This card can protect more than one unit at a time.

name: Vulnerable
description: The card cannot be protected.

name: Deflect
description: Breaks the protection established between two units.

name: Assault X
description: Destroy an unprotected unit with X or less power. Multiple assault abilities can be combined on the same turn on the same turn, if the target cannot be slain with a single blow.

name: Assassinate X
description: Destroy a unit of X or less power, bypassing protection.

name: Overkill X
description: Trigger this ability if the value of an assault or assassinate move exceeds the point value of the target unit by at least X.

name: Seize X
description: Move an unprotected unit with X or less power to the opposite side of the battlefield.

name: Armor X
description: Added to unit power when calculating vulnerability to Assault, Assassinate, and Seize abilities.

name: Invisible
description: The unit cannot be targeted by hostile abilities.

name: Reflex
description: Trigger this ability when targeted by another ability.

name: Expire
description: Trigger this ability when destroyed.

name: Mana
description: An elemental resource used to trigger certain abilities.

name: Expend X
description: Reroll X common or personal mana dice of the requisite type in order to trigger the ability.

name: Conjure X
description: Change X common or personal mana dice to a certain type.

name: Reroll X
description: Reroll X common or personal mana dice of any color.

name: Rally X
description: Adds the indicated number of points to the player's score.

name: Rout X
description: Subtracts the indicated number of points to the player's score. If below zero at the end of a round, the round is automatically lost.

name: Retreat X
description: Trigger this ability if the player is able to subtract X points from their score.

name: Finale
description: Trigger this ability if the card is active at the end of the round.

name: Preserve
description: Prevent a unit from moving to the graveyard at the end of the round.

name: Disloyal
description: The card is played to the opposite side of the battlefield.

name: Chaos X
description: Trigger this ability if there are at least X unique mana types available.

name: Imbibe
description: Trigger the ability when a liquor card is equipped to the unit.
